```{r}
library(Rcpp)

myroot <- cppFunction('double myroot(double x) { return ::sqrt(x); }')
myroot(16)
```



```{r}
library(Rcpp)

myroot2 <- rcpp(signature(xs="numeric"), 
                  body='double x=as<double>(xs); return wrap(::sqrt(x));')
myroot2(16)
```
